content: Why are the relevant sections in the spec, for this new operation on the CodeSystem resource, called "Value Set based Validation? e.g. http://build.fhir.org/operationslist.html and http://build.fhir.org/codesystem-operations.html#validate-code
copy paste error- one of the last things I did in the tx space. thought I got all the value set bits. sorry
Guessed as much - but it's good news that this operation has been added and (hopefully @Richard Ettema) we can test it at the New Orleans Connectathon.

@Peter Jordan We'll be adding support for the FHIR R4 Ballot version (v3.2.0) over the next few days to Touchstone. After that, we can update the existing $validate-code TestScripts for Connectathon 17.

@Richard Ettema - as the $validate-code operation on the ValueSet remains, we need to clone those Test Scripts and adapt them to run against the CodeSystem resource. Obviously, some of the In Parameters vary, but the Out Parameters are the same.
I would love to see tests for CodeSystem.supplements and ConceptMap.unmapped - there seem to be big gaps in their specification
Do you have any good examples that AEGIS might be able to use to create Test Scripts?

Not for CodeSystem.supplements. This is a late inclusion I have only just discovered. I believe it is too immature and insufficiently documented for normative status and have created GF#14356 to request it be demoted to Trial Use.

For ConceptMap.unmapped we've not yet implemented or concretely explored the space, but there's some simple edge cases that could be explored -- cyclic references, etc
